name: Letter To A Friend - AsylumJam 2015 Entry
name_original: Letter To A Friend - AsylumJam 2015 Entry
description:
WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS


Letter To A Friend is a short first person experience by Christoph Frey about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station.

Its visual references come from expressionistic silent movies and old analog recordings.

The game was made in 48 hours during the Asylum Jam 2015 and is a proof of concept regarding the visual aestethics and atmosphere.


Controls:
W,A,S,D to move
Mouse to look
E to interact
Esc to quit

If you liked the game and want to support me, you can do it on my Patreon.
